action_description: This action will start the selected dishwasher program.
This action will turn on your dishwasher.
This action will stop the active dishwasher program.
This action will turn off your dishwasher.

This action will activate Silence on Demand on your dishwasher*, which reduces the noise level to a minimum for up to 30 minutes*. Please note that not all programs supports Silence on Demand feature.
This action will start the dishwasher program that is currently selected on the appliance.
